hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Version
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter Version to Deploy. Must be entered as version number + build number ie; 4.0.0_35)

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/ksh if [[ $BUILD_USER_ID = "jschaeffer" || $BUILD_USER_ID = "clecrone" || $BUILD_USER_ID = "lhassell" ]]; then echo "

Authorized Deployer - Proceeding with deployment

" else echo "Unauthorized User!" echo "Exiting!" exit 1 fi

#!/bin/ksh export BUILD_TAG export Component export Version export DeployTarg="prodtest" echo "Deployment ID: ${BUILD_TAG} - ${BUILD_ID}
" >> /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log echo "Deployment to ${DeployTarg} by ${BUILD_USER}
" >> /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log export CompSet="$(echo $Component | cut -f2 -d:)" export Component="$(echo $Component | cut -f1 -d:)" cd /opt/build/scripts/prodtest ./ProdTest_Single_Component_Deploy.sh $Component $DB_Rebuild $Version $Clear_Logs $DeployTarg $BUILD_TAG $BUILD_USER_ID $CompSet if grep -q "ERROR:" /opt/cie/jenkins/jobs/${JOB_NAME}/builds/${BUILD_NUMBER}/log ; then echo "Deployment Failed." echo "  Deployment Failed !!
" >> /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log echo "  URL For Deploy output: console
" >> /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log echo "
" >> /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log echo "

" >> /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log mv /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${DeployTarg}.html /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${DeployTarg}.tmp cat /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${DeployTarg}.tmp > /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${DeployTarg}.html rm /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${DeployTarg}.tmp rm /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log exit 1 else echo "URL For Deploy output: console
" >> /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log echo "

" >> /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log echo "

" >> /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log mv /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${DeployTarg}.html /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${DeployTarg}.tmp cat /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${DeployTarg}.tmp > /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${DeployTarg}.html rm /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${DeployTarg}.tmp rm /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log fi
